onboarding_setup.response:
üöÄ **Onboarding & Setup:**

**What is Movic Steps?**
Movic Steps is a comprehensive step tracking app that helps you monitor your daily activity, set goals, and stay motivated on your fitness journey.

**Account Required?**
No account required! Movic Steps works completely offline and locally on your device.

**Required Permissions:**
‚Ä¢ Motion & Fitness access (for step counting)
‚Ä¢ HealthKit access (for data sync with Apple Health)

**How to Enable:**
1. Go to iPhone Settings > Privacy & Security > Motion & Fitness
2. Enable "Movic Steps"
3. Go to Settings > Privacy & Security > Health
4. Enable all permissions for Movic Steps

**Offline Support:**
Yes! Movic Steps works completely offline. Data syncs when you're back online.

**Compatibility:**
‚Ä¢ iOS 16.0 or later
‚Ä¢ iPhone and iPad supported
‚Ä¢ No Apple Watch required (but supported if available)

step_counting.response:
üì± **Step Counting & Accuracy:**

**How it works:**
‚Ä¢ Uses iPhone's built-in motion sensors (Core Motion framework)
‚Ä¢ Detects walking patterns and movement
‚Ä¢ Highly accurate when phone is in pocket or bag

**Accuracy Tips:**
‚Ä¢ Keep phone in pocket for best results
‚Ä¢ Avoid carrying in hand while walking
‚Ä¢ Treadmill and elliptical steps count
‚Ä¢ Stairs and elevation are included

**Why Different from Apple Health:**
‚Ä¢ Different detection algorithms
‚Ä¢ Normal to have small variations
‚Ä¢ Both are accurate in their own way

**Refresh Rate:**
‚Ä¢ Updates every few minutes
‚Ä¢ Real-time step counting
‚Ä¢ Syncs with HealthKit automatically

**Calibration:**
‚Ä¢ Adjust stride length in settings
‚Ä¢ Enable calculated metrics
‚Ä¢ Auto-calibration available

**Troubleshooting:**
‚Ä¢ Check Motion & Fitness permissions
‚Ä¢ Ensure phone is in pocket
‚Ä¢ Restart app if steps stop updating

goal_management.response:
üéØ **Goals, Streaks & Achievements:**

**Setting Goals:**
‚Ä¢ Tap "Add New Goal" in Goals tab
‚Ä¢ Choose from: Steps, Distance, Calories, Active Minutes
‚Ä¢ Use quick presets or enter custom values
‚Ä¢ Set daily, weekly, or monthly targets

**Editing Goals:**
‚Ä¢ Tap the pencil icon on any goal card
‚Ä¢ Or swipe left and tap "Edit"
‚Ä¢ Modify target value and save

**Deleting Goals:**
‚Ä¢ Tap the trash icon on any goal card
‚Ä¢ Or swipe left and tap "Delete"
‚Ä¢ Confirm deletion (cannot be undone)

**Streaks:**
‚Ä¢ Automatic streak tracking
‚Ä¢ Visual streak indicators
‚Ä¢ Streak protection available
‚Ä¢ Pause streaks when needed

**Achievements:**
‚Ä¢ Unlock badges for milestones
‚Ä¢ Achievement history in Insights
‚Ä¢ Progress celebrations
‚Ä¢ Share achievements

**Goal Types Available:**
‚Ä¢ Steps: 1,000 - 100,000
‚Ä¢ Distance: 0.1 - 100 km (or 60 miles)
‚Ä¢ Calories: 50 - 2,000
‚Ä¢ Active Minutes: 5 - 480

healthkit_integration.response:
üè• **HealthKit & Data Sync:**

**Permissions Required:**
‚Ä¢ Read: Steps, Distance, Active Energy Burned
‚Ä¢ Write: Steps, Distance, Active Energy Burned

**How to Enable:**
1. Go to iPhone Settings > Privacy & Security > Health
2. Find "Movic Steps" in the list
3. Enable all permissions
4. Restart the app if needed

**Data Syncing:**
‚Ä¢ Automatic sync with HealthKit
‚Ä¢ Data appears in Apple Health app
‚Ä¢ Works with other fitness apps
‚Ä¢ Offline data syncs when online

**Manual Refresh:**
‚Ä¢ Pull down on main screen
‚Ä¢ Force refresh in settings
‚Ä¢ Restart app if needed

**Data Export:**
‚Ä¢ Export to CSV format
‚Ä¢ Available in settings
‚Ä¢ Includes all historical data
‚Ä¢ Compatible with Excel/Google Sheets

**Import Past Data:**
‚Ä¢ Automatically imports from HealthKit
‚Ä¢ Shows historical trends
‚Ä¢ No manual import needed

**Troubleshooting:**
‚Ä¢ Check permissions in Settings
‚Ä¢ Restart the app
‚Ä¢ Ensure HealthKit is enabled
‚Ä¢ Force refresh data if needed

calorie_calculations.response:
üî• **Calorie & Active Minute Calculations:**

**Calorie Calculation:**
‚Ä¢ Based on walking speed, step length, and distance
‚Ä¢ Enable "Use Calculated Metrics" in settings
‚Ä¢ More personalized than generic estimates
‚Ä¢ Formula: Uses your walking patterns for accuracy
‚Ä¢ Includes weight and height factors

**Active Minutes:**
‚Ä¢ Time spent in moderate to vigorous activity
‚Ä¢ Calculated from movement patterns
‚Ä¢ Includes walking, running, and other activities
‚Ä¢ Updates in real-time
‚Ä¢ Based on intensity levels

**Walking Parameters:**
‚Ä¢ Walking Speed: Adjust for your pace
‚Ä¢ Step Length: Calibrate for accuracy
‚Ä¢ Use Calculated Metrics: Enable for better estimates
‚Ä¢ Auto-calibration available

**Accuracy Factors:**
‚Ä¢ Stride length calibration
‚Ä¢ Walking speed adjustment
‚Ä¢ Elevation changes
‚Ä¢ Movement intensity
‚Ä¢ Personal body metrics

**Settings:**
‚Ä¢ Go to Settings > Walking Parameters
‚Ä¢ Adjust walking speed and step length
‚Ä¢ Enable calculated metrics for better accuracy
‚Ä¢ Calibrate with known distances

**Tips for Accuracy:**
‚Ä¢ Keep phone in pocket for best results
‚Ä¢ Calibrate your step length
‚Ä¢ Enable calculated metrics
‚Ä¢ Update weight/height in settings

tips_best_practices.response:
üí° **Tips & Best Practices:**

**Daily Goal Recommendations:**
‚Ä¢ Start with 5,000-8,000 steps
‚Ä¢ Gradually increase to 10,000+
‚Ä¢ Listen to your body
‚Ä¢ Adjust based on fitness level

**Hitting 10,000 Steps:**
‚Ä¢ Take stairs instead of elevators
‚Ä¢ Park farther from entrances
‚Ä¢ Walk during phone calls
‚Ä¢ Take walking breaks at work
‚Ä¢ Walk after meals

**Desk Job Tips:**
‚Ä¢ Set hourly step reminders
‚Ä¢ Use standing desk if possible
‚Ä¢ Walk during lunch breaks
‚Ä¢ Take the long way to meetings
‚Ä¢ Use bathroom on different floors

**Improving Accuracy:**
‚Ä¢ Keep phone in pocket
‚Ä¢ Calibrate step length
‚Ä¢ Enable calculated metrics
‚Ä¢ Update personal info
‚Ä¢ Use consistent placement

**Weight Loss Goals:**
‚Ä¢ Combine with calorie tracking
‚Ä¢ Set realistic step targets
‚Ä¢ Increase gradually
‚Ä¢ Monitor progress
‚Ä¢ Celebrate milestones

**Motivation Tips:**

app_permissions.response:
üîê **App Permissions:**

**Required Permissions:**
‚Ä¢ **Motion & Fitness**: Step counting
‚Ä¢ **HealthKit**: Data sync
‚Ä¢ **Notifications**: Goal reminders
‚Ä¢ **Location** (optional): Distance tracking

**How to Enable:**
1. Go to iPhone Settings
2. Tap "Privacy & Security"
3. Find "Motion & Fitness"
4. Enable "Movic Steps"
5. Go to "Health" section
6. Enable all permissions for Movic Steps

**Motion & Fitness:**
‚Ä¢ Required for step counting
‚Ä¢ Uses iPhone's motion sensors
‚Ä¢ Tracks walking and running
‚Ä¢ No GPS required
‚Ä¢ Works offline

**HealthKit Permissions:**
‚Ä¢ **Read**: Steps, Distance, Calories
‚Ä¢ **Write**: Steps, Distance, Calories
‚Ä¢ Syncs with Apple Health
‚Ä¢ Works with other apps
‚Ä¢ Automatic data sharing

**Notification Permissions:**
‚Ä¢ Goal reminders
‚Ä¢ Achievement notifications
‚Ä¢ Weekly reports
‚Ä¢ Customizable alerts
‚Ä¢ Can be disabled

**Location (Optional):**
‚Ä¢ More accurate distance
‚Ä¢ GPS-based tracking
‚Ä¢ Battery usage consideration
‚Ä¢ Can be disabled
‚Ä¢ Still works without

**Privacy Protection:**
‚Ä¢ All data stays on device
‚Ä¢ No external sharing
‚Ä¢ Apple's privacy standards
‚Ä¢ You control permissions
‚Ä¢ Transparent data use

**Troubleshooting:**
‚Ä¢ Check all permissions
‚Ä¢ Restart app after enabling
‚Ä¢ Force close and reopen
‚Ä¢ Contact support if issues
‚Ä¢ Verify in Settings

language.response:
üåé **App Language**

**Change the App‚Äôs Language**
‚Ä¢ Open **Settings ‚Üí Language** ‚Üí choose your preferred language ‚Üí tap **Apply**.  
‚Ä¢ On iOS: You can also go to **iOS Settings ‚Üí [App Name] ‚Üí Preferred Language** to override the system language just for this app.  
‚Ä¢ On Android (if applicable): **System Settings ‚Üí Apps ‚Üí [App Name] ‚Üí Language**.

**What Changes**
‚Ä¢ UI labels, menus, buttons, and most in-app copy.  
‚Ä¢ Date, time, and number formats follow your chosen **Region/Locale**.  
‚Ä¢ Some server-delivered content (e.g., support articles) may appear in English until translations are available.

**Auto vs Manual**
‚Ä¢ **Follow System** (default): App matches your phone‚Äôs primary language.  
‚Ä¢ **Manual Override**: Pick a different language in-app even if your phone is set to another language.

**Supported Languages**
‚Ä¢ English (US), English (UK), Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese (BR), Japanese, Korean, Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), Arabic (RTL).  
‚Ä¢ Don‚Äôt see yours? Tap **Request a Language** at the bottom of the Language screen.

**Accessibility & Input**
‚Ä¢ Works with **VoiceOver/TalkBack**; screen reader texts follow your selected language where available.  
‚Ä¢ Keyboard/input language is controlled by your OS keyboard settings. Add keyboards in **System Settings ‚Üí General ‚Üí Keyboard**.

**Right-to-Left (RTL) Support**
‚Ä¢ Arabic/Hebrew UIs mirror layout for comfortable reading. If alignment looks off, restart the app after switching.

**Offline & Downloads**
‚Ä¢ Language packs are lightweight. If you switch languages while offline, the change applies but some texts may fall back to English until the pack is cached.

**Troubleshooting**
1) Text looks like *gibberish* or mixed languages ‚Üí Force close and reopen the app.  
2) Some screens didn‚Äôt change ‚Üí Clear cache from **Settings ‚Üí Storage** (no data loss).  
3) Dates/numbers look wrong ‚Üí Set **Region/Locale** under **Settings ‚Üí Language ‚Üí Region**.  
4) Screen reader reads the wrong language ‚Üí Check OS **Preferred Languages** order.  
5) Still stuck? Email **support@airforcerp.com** (include your device, OS version, and app version).

**Tip**
‚Ä¢ After changing language or region, a quick app restart ensures every screen updates correctly.
